price: Isaan anaaf diinota; garuu Gooftaa aalamootaa malee (inni jaalalloo kooti).
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
